readme.title: FuriosaAI Cloud Native Toolkit Helm Charts

sections.heading: FuriosaAI Cloud Native Toolkit Helm Charts

children.heading: Usage
children.text:
Helm
must be installed to use the charts.
Please refer to Helm's
documentation
to get started.
helm repo add furiosa https://furiosa-ai.github.io/helm-charts
You can then run
helm search repo furiosa
to see the charts.

children.heading: furiosa-feature-discovery
children.text:
If youâ€™re using a Kubernetes cluster with a version lower than v1.24, installing the furiosa-feature-discovery Helm chart may fail due to a resource version issue with its dependency chart node-feature-discovery.
To work around this, manually install an older version of node-feature-discovery on your cluster.
Then, in the
values.yaml
file of the furiosa-feature-discovery chart, set
node-feature-discovery.enabled
to
false
to prevent automatic installation.
